title: ‚úàÔ∏è NEW MSFS Sim Update 2 Beta (1.4.10.0) IS LIVE! What Changed? Full Patch Notes Breakdown!
description:
Sim Update 2 Beta (1.4.9.0) for Microsoft Flight Simulator is now available! We're exploring the build released on March 28, 2025, focusing on the significant known issue affecting multiplayer pilot visibility. We'll also discuss the performance and stability enhancements, aircraft fixes, and VR updates included in this beta. Keep your MSFS experience up-to-date!

04:51 - EFB
